channel.title: Read My Poem
channel.description:
I usually don't do this, but I really wanted people to give constructive criticism towards it, and almost no one goes in the writing section. Please read, rate, and tell me what you think. I guess we could discuss maybe the source of my emotion when I wrote it this morning. Please tell me what you think. Sorry for the vast vocabulary, but I was feeling really intellectual at the time. You might need dictionary.com for this. I was thinking about entering it in my schools poetry thing for freshman, I think it'd get a few good remarks.
Lack Of Compassion Buzzy Jack
The fist clenches, And so do it's intentions. It doesn't know how to breathe, and it's all regression. Manifestation of it's aggression due to lies of creation, Imaginations of your torture increases it's elation.
It's chest is cold when It thinks of you, And it's all It can do not to let this hatred brew. But it's to late, and now It thinks of how these thoughts were accrued, And it can't help but let it's actions pursue. And it's to late for you as it's emotional disposition is distributed.
As it's abhorrence is acuted, And as it reaches it's destination, There is no hope for your salvation, You are now in line for damnation, And your death becomes accelerated.
And to think, You created this abominable collaboration, With your selfish temptations and power hungry dictation. The thoughts of your deobfuscation is it's only motivation, As is your fascination with power molestation. "Justicia Servo" Is it's ambition, And it has set off the ignition of your eternal excruciation. And just like you and your need for constant prevarication, My detestation for you will go on in infinite continuation.

item.title: Read My Poem
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Wrong section?..

I cba to read more then 3 sentences right now…

Read full topic

item.title: Read My Poem
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

[quote=“pko, post:13, topic:128681”][quote author=Buzzy link=topic=179309.msg1640450#msg1640450 date=1185884087]

No. I honestly was just sitting there, and I used to write a lot of poems but hadn’t had any inspiration lately, but I just felt like writing something today. I didn’t mean for it to, but it came out describing my father.
[/quote]God, you sound a lot like me. You’ll come to regret resentment for your father one day.

My reasons aren’t because he wouldn’t buy me a Lambo for my 12th b-day. Not that yours were, but my reasons are legitimate.

Lay down the beat and spit out the Rhymes!

No seriously I like but to be quite honest, the “big words” Kinda make it harder to connect with the poem on a personal level. Who knows maybe it’s just me but when I convey my feelings I usually don’t look in a thesaurus, I hope this doesn’t sound harsh.

I didn’t look in a thesaurus, simply because I don’t need to. I just thought of the words that described my situations and emotions. But thanks for giving a good reason. It’s definitely appreciated.

0/100
you tried to use too many big words, and it sounds retarded.

Because you didn’t know half the words the poem gets a 0/100?

I must say, this is horrible :\

Reason being…?

Because I felt you were attempting to put big words in there to imply LOLIMSMART.[/quote]
I don’t think I need to.

[quote=“exe626, post:14, topic:128681”]Lol^
I don’t like it because it just sounds awful :s[/quote]
Do you not like that style of writing… or some other reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Read My Poem
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

I usually don’t do this, but I really wanted people to give constructive criticism towards it, and almost no one goes in the writing section. Please read, rate, and tell me what you think. I guess we could discuss maybe the source of my emotion when I wrote it this morning. Please tell me what you think. Sorry for the vast vocabulary, but I was feeling really intellectual at the time. You might need dictionary.com for this. I was thinking about entering it in my schools poetry thing for freshman, I think it’d get a few good remarks.

Lack Of Compassion
Buzzy Jack

The fist clenches,
And so do it’s intentions.
It doesn’t know how to breathe, and it’s all regression.
Manifestation of it’s aggression due to lies of creation,
Imaginations of your torture increases it’s elation.

It’s chest is cold when It thinks of you,
And it’s all It can do not to let this hatred brew.
But it’s to late, and now It thinks of how these thoughts were accrued,
And it can’t help but let it’s actions pursue.
And it’s to late for you as it’s emotional disposition is distributed.

As it’s abhorrence is acuted,
And as it reaches it’s destination,
There is no hope for your salvation,
You are now in line for damnation,
And your death becomes accelerated.

And to think,
You created this abominable collaboration,
With your selfish temptations and power hungry dictation.
The thoughts of your deobfuscation is it’s only motivation,
As is your fascination with power molestation.
“Justicia Servo” Is it’s ambition,
And it has set off the ignition of your eternal excruciation.
And just like you and your need for constant prevarication,
My detestation for you will go on in infinite continuation.
